title: How to verify?
subtitle: Explore workflows and tools for verification.
mobileDescription: A knowledge graph on verification tools.
mobileAlert: To use this website properly please use a desktop device.
feedbackBody:
Hey,

I got some feedback on {{url}}.

Best
introText:
Learn about verification workflows and tools by exploring this website.

Start with the type of digital media you want to verify and work your way down to the tools that can help you.
We have gathered our experience and insights in a knowledge graph to share with you.

Sources for this knowledge graph are; Julia Bayer, First Draft, Bellingcat, The Verification Handbook, OSINT community.

If you also have valuable verification workflows and tools to share or miss your favorite tool then please let us know via the feedback form.
This website has been created by [DW Research & Cooperation](https://innovation.dw.com/) and is co-funded by the German BKM under the KID2 Project, XXX funding scheme.
